Articles.Content:
Hi,

I really love Doctor Who and KSP, so I decided to do a little drawing:

Some time ago a little Kerbal was eating kananas and toughed about rockets. He heard a really strange wooshing sound and looked around. There was a blue box standing right next to the KSC! Impressed by the following meeting with a guy with a weird red hat, this Kerbal, Russeltdavies Kerman, later went on to run a show on KBC (Kerbal Broadcasting Corporation) called Doctor Kerman

Here is an excerpt from the show:

Hello, I am the Doctor!

Doctor Kerman?

No, just the Doctor.

(Made completely with Inkpad on iPad)

Kamik423
